reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made, comfortable, and flattering, with one noting it minimizes chest appearance and another mentioning good coverage for the tummy. The length is perfect for wearing with boots, and customers like the pattern and color, with one noting it looks more expensive than its price. The fabric quality receives mixed reviews, with some praising it while others find it thin and cheap. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice dress at a good price point.
items.body: This is a really nice dress. I did order it one size up from what I normally would wear. It is a maxi on me and I am 5â€˜4â€œ tall. With a pair of boots it looks fabulous and I also put a wide waisted belt under the bodice. Bonus! It has pockets and theyâ€™re deep. I love the smocking. Donâ€™t hesitate to order this dress. I ordered it in two colors and Iâ€™m very happy that I did. It doesnâ€™t have any zippers or buttons and easily slips on over your head. The skirt is gathered layers, but they lay flat and thereâ€™s nice flow in the fabric. The only stretchiness is in the bodice where it is smocked. Itâ€™s a very comfortable dress that Iâ€™m looking forward to wearing. I like the fabric and do not find it too thin. The stress is not lined and that is what I was looking for. The style is slightly little house on the Prairie, but just slightly. The sleeves have elastic at the wrists that is not tight. The sleeves are generous and hit my hand at a nice point. I personally hate sleeves that are too short and I never buy three-quarter length sleeves. So, this dress works out really well for me. I can see that Iâ€™m going to be wearing these dresses a lot. I may even order a third dress in a different color. Read more
items.author: Gray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Chic Dress
items.body: I purchased the dress in green and white in a pinch for a family friendâ€™s event. Thankfully, I received it within 1 1/2 days of ordering it. (Thanks, Amazon Prime). After receiving it, I tried it on and was extremely pleased with the length (which reaches my ankles), and overall fit of the dress. The bodice, while form fitting, is not too clingy or tight. For reference, I am 5â€™5â€ and 125 pounds and ordered the small. The dress is also very light, airy, and ideal for the spring or summer. However, you could totally get away with wearing this during the fall, too. I paired this dress with some white, high-heeled sandals, a hat, and pearl earrings. I liked this dress so much that I ordered it in blue. All in all, I found the dress flattering, attractive, modest, and chic, and would order it for a 3rd time in a heartbeat! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So Cute But "Prairie Like" On Me :(
items.body: This is a very pretty dress. In my opinion, the bottom is too frilly. It should not have the three tiers to the skirt as it looks very young and little house on the prairie vibe. The print is cute but not really for older women. I think that if you are in your mid-twenties, you can get away with the print and the skirt. Older women it tends to look like again, a prairie dress or as I was told by a family member, "looks like an old lady dress or little house on the prairie. Put an apron on and a bonnet and you are good to go!" This definitely dashed my hopes! I tried on the dress and I wear a size 14/16. Recommend sizing up if you like a little more looseness. The XL was loose but since it is polyester, it will definitely NOT be a dress you want to wear in hot or warm weather. Reserve for cool or wintery weather. The upper bodice and sleeves are well designed and very comfortable. The sleeves are nice and long. I loved the modesty of this dress, but again the tiered bottom is just too much. The pocket placement was perfect. Set to the front as to not add volume to the hips! Well done here on dress design! Sadly, both that In tried are being returned due to the print and the cut of the skirt. I so badly wanted this dress to be a winner for me. If you are younger and more fashion forward, I think this would potentially be a great dress for YOU! Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute church or date dress
items.body: I bought this dress for myself for church. I'm 5'8 and 180 lbs. I have a large bust (36DDD). I decided to get XL but I think L would have as well. I love that it's long down to my ankles. It's loose though and fits in all the right places. The top part comes down far enough (not right under my bust) and it is super cute and trendy. The material feels nice as well. And it's modest. I'm obsessed. So cute for church, dates, and other dressy events. Read more
items.author: Deborah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress.
items.body: Beautiful dress. Have received so many compliments on this dress. Fit perfectly. Beautiful material and color. Read more
items.author: kathleen a. padilla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: This is so much more than I could have imagined. I was afraid it might 'wear me' because I'm 5'5" but I'm wearing it. It's lightweight and is so flattering. The colors are great and I'll be able to wear it to all sorts of events - work, parties, weekends. The size is right. I ordered a small. Read more
items.author: a

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for anyone with a larger bust!
items.body: If you have a a large bust, this looks ridiculous. Dresses with this ruching at the top usually do, but I wanted to try anyway. Best on flatter chests. Super cute from the bust down. I got the wine color and itâ€™s very pretty. Sad I have to return it. Read more
items.author: HeathJenn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
items.body: One of my new favorites. So comfortable and soft. The weight of the fabric is perfect, not shear. The colors are as expected. A new favorite go to dress. I love the pockets! Read more
items.author: Leslie Smith

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown Purple Floral, Army Green White Flower, Floral Purple Green, Sky Blue White Flower, Olive Green, Black, Navy, Wine Red, Apricot Rose Red Flower, Floral Black Red, Blue Green, White Orange Pink Flower, Floral White Rose Pink, Orange Rose Red Flower. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
